name: A BlueridgeDebate Style
description: For the forum http://blueridgedebate.com ... BTW, thanks, Bannination! :)
additional_info:
01.08.2014: A few further edits ...

11.07.2013, 11.08.2013: Still making this work from a wide screen to a regular screen - simultaneously and not exclusively - I want it to work for both types of monitors at any resolution (hey, there are still Luddites out there and I have one monitor I use that is commensurate to my old Luddite ways) ... :)

11.02.2013: Just got a wide screen monitor ... previously it was designed on a 1440x900 resolution. Updated for 1920x1080

10.15.2013: A few updates ... great site! :)

02.09.2013: Minor update for the Conservative Forum as well as the Main Forum.

01.29.2013: Edited the log-in page.

01.04.2013: Edited for some PM issues I discovered.

12.21.2012 (oh my! we're still here! ;) ): More updates thanks to a fellow I only know as VenDaz ... thank you, VenDaz! :)

12.15.12: Still more ...

12.13.12: More updates ...

12.12.12: Fun updates ... :)

11.20.2012, 11.22.2012: Additional updates.

11.15.2012, 11.16.2012, 11.17.2012: More updates for more areas of the forum (default theme thereof)

11.13.2012: Additional updates ... and more ...

11.09.2012, 11.10.2012: Many updates. I hope you like 'em! :)

11.06.2012: Found a huge error in search results ... fixed, for now, but not done yet. Updated, again, but far from done.

11.01.2012, 11.02.2012, 11.03.2012, 11.05.2012: A few more tweaks ... more to come ... :)

10.30.2012: More updates ... also updated the image for when the Style is applied.

10.29.2012: Very minor updates ... still working on it as I get time. :)  As I get further into it, I'll put up an updated "after" screenshot. For now, it's not a whole lot different.

10.28.2012 (later): A few more updates.

10.28.2012: Initial iteration ... more changes to come.
